page.title: 06TRADE IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: {Westbury-on-Trym}is a busy shopping area with many types of shop, predominantly non food shops.There are many banks,& building societies. Shoppers complain of too many estate agents & other non-consumer products, but all wants catered for in area so shoppers only need to shop in the city centre for specialist items. {Southmead }consists of many small shops predominantly food or DIY.No large supermarkets in the vicinity.In the main street are several garages, builders merchants,building societies & insurance brokers. {Henbury }has few shops,just food shops,a hairdresser, & a post office.
